participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about art, Emily is always eager to express herself through her drawings and dance. She is optimistic and has a quirky sense of humor.
participant_1.background: My boss doesn't know that I'm an art student, but I'm hoping to show him my portfolio soon. My hardest decision was whether to give up my lasagna addiction or travel to the UK. Dancing is my passion. I rely on public transportation because my eyes are too weak to drive. I get to show off my long fingernails.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Sophia is adventurous and nurturing. She loves to explore new places and has a deep appreciation for music, which brings her joy and relaxation.
participant_2.background: I had a c-section when my first daughter was born. I have traveled overseas many times. I am taking online classes. My favorite music is hip hop. I get lost in my music or tinkering with my car.

content.text: Good thanks, I'm excited to be starting my art classes again.
That's awesome! I've always been jealous of people who can draw.
It's never too late to learn! What are you passionate about?
I'm really passionate about dancing and traveling. I've been lucky enough to travel all over the world and I love learning about new cultures.
That's awesome! I wish I could dance but I'm way too uncoordinated. I've been to the UK once and it was amazing!

The UK is so great! I had a c-section when my first daughter was born and I had to stay in the hospital for a few days. I got to watch a lot of old British TV shows and I fell in love with the culture.
That's so cool! I love British TV. I'm actually a huge fan of Doctor Who.
Doctor Who is awesome! I'm a big fan of Sherlock Holmes and Downton Abbey.
Those are both great shows! I'm excited to see what they do with the new season of Doctor Who.
Me too! I'm also looking forward to the new season of Sherlock Holmes.
I'm sure they'll both be great
